I have a player who can't interact or click any buttons on any of the games in the Text Adventures library (including my game). 

He has, quote...
"Restarted and redownloaded each game.
.NET FRAMEWORK says I have the latest version on my Win 10 or at least the program says I do. 
But I still can't press any button or interact with the text.
I have quest580 installed as well."

Anyone know anything he can try?

Anonynn.

Nevermind. We check out this link...

***http://textadventures.co.uk/forum/quest/topic/8ogey-lrnkecgpgfk8xeug/unable-to-play-games-on-desktop-commands-dont-work***

And he ran the quest installation folder itself in Admin and it fixed all the problems :) 

Anonynn.
